code: var getItem=function getItem(key){var data=typeof window!=='undefined'?localStorage.getItem(key):'';try{return JSON.parse(data);}catch(err){return data;}};var setItem=function setItem(key,value){var stringify=typeof value!=='string'?JSON.stringify(value):value;return localStorage.setItem(key,stringify);};var removeItem=function removeItem(key){localStorage.removeItem(key);};export{getItem,setItem,removeItem};
